message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
I'll take a slight majority, but still a fair deal!
You're getting greedy, I'll take a bit more!
I'll take a bigger share, but still leaving you with a decent chunk!
You're getting too bold, I'll take the bigger share now!
I'll take the majority, but still leaving you with something!
You're being too aggressive, I'll take a bigger share now!
I'll take the lion's share, but you'll still get a tiny piece!
You're being ruthless, I'll take what I can get!
